name: Little Gems Learning Systems
overview:
As many parents want to give best education to their children to make them achievers, Little Gems Learning Systems has been developing thousands of young genius in India since 1993 .

According to Little Gems the learning starts while the child is in womb as it learns to hear the mother’s voice,external sound and also understands mothers mood . Little Gems provides Fetal and Infant Education since 1993. This is based on Indian wisdom and modern science with well researched and proven methods which have been successful in developing the mothers mindset during pregnancy to give birth to a healthy and genius baby through educating them to provide a favorable internal and external environment for the fetus to develop better and also to improve infants intellect through natural brain stimulation .

The goal of Right Brain Education or brain stimulation training is to enable the full, balanced functioning of both sides of your child’s brain by nurturing their often-neglected right brain. In doing so, Right Brain Education results in a greater whole-brain intelligence,creativity,photo-memory.intuition, balanced mind and much more.
